greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of families of 3-subsets of an n-set that cover all 2-subsets.
comment: Number of 3-uniform simple hypergraphs on n vertices such that each pair of vertices are together in some edge.
formula: a(n) = SUM (-1)^e(G) (n!/a(G)) 2^t(G), where the sum is over the unlabeled graphs G with n vertices, e(G) is the number of edges in the complement of G, a(G) is the order of the automorphism group of G, and t(G) is the number of triangles in G.
results.author: _Brendan McKay_, Apr 07 2018
